entities.name: OpportunityRelationship
entities.description: Relationship between an account or contact and an opportunity.

attributes.name: customerOpportunityRoleId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the opportunity relationship.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: customerId
attributes.description: Select the account or contact associated to the opportunity, such as a strategic partner, third-party vendor, or key decision maker.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the opportunity relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

attributes.name: opportunityId
attributes.description: Choose the opportunity that the specified account or contact is related to. The opportunity relationship will be displayed in the Relationships view on the selected opportunity.

attributes.name: opportunityRoleId
attributes.description: Choose the role or nature of the relationship that the customer has with the opportunity. The field is read-only until a customer has been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

attributes.name: opportunityStateCode
attributes.description: Status of the opportunity.

attributes.name: opportunityStatusCode
attributes.description: Reason for the status of the opportunity.
